availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Harrodsburg, Kentucky, painter. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth S. Dean Porter in Mercer County, Kentucky, on August 15, 1860. Painter in Harrodsburg in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, p. 6.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film #000191864.
Find A Grave, "Samuel Huntington Porter (1812-1876)," Memorial #18765747, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/18765747 (accessed March 13, 2017).
